org.grouplens.lenskit.basic

Class PrecomputedItemScorer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.grouplens.lenskit.basic.AbstractItemScorer
      • org.grouplens.lenskit.basic.PrecomputedItemScorer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, ItemScorer

    public class PrecomputedItemScorer
extends AbstractItemScorer
implements java.io.Serializable
    An item scorer that stores a precomputed map of item scores.
    Since:
    2.1
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • score

        public void score(long user,
         @Nonnull
         MutableSparseVector scores)
        Description copied from interface: ItemScorer
        Score items in a vector. The key domain of the provided vector is the items to score, and the score method sets the values for each item to its score (or unsets it, if no score can be provided). The previous values are discarded.
        Specified by:
        score in interface ItemScorer
        Parameters:
        user - The user ID.
        scores - The score vector.

      • newBuilder

        public static PrecomputedItemScorer.Builder newBuilder()
        Construct a new builder for precomputed item scorers. This is useful for building item scorers for mocks.
        Returns:
        A new builder for item scorers.
